title.rendered: “IDF Strikes Hezbollah: Air Force Targets Militants in Houla After Cross-Border Attack”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

Documentation: Hezbollah operatives were identified entering a military structure of the organization in the Houla area and were attacked from the air.

A unit from Unit 869 identified operatives entering a military structure of the terrorist organization Hezbollah in the Houla region in southern Lebanon a short while ago. In a rapid response, Israeli Air Force fighter jets attacked the building where the operatives were located, alongside another military structure of the organization.

Additionally, an Israeli Air Force aircraft attacked a Hezbollah operative in the Houla region.

Earlier today, two anti-tank launches were detected crossing from Lebanon and landing in the Misgav Am area, causing no injuries. IDF forces retaliated with artillery at the sources of fire.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/4cIsTcI
